entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING

entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH SCATTERED SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH HEAVY RAINFALL
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
LESS HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS
LOWS AROUND 40
NORTH WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
